xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/53130-A Lonely Cow Weeps at Dawn 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1NufyxOhvXaXPYxmjiipFkAqYJi.jpg A young widow, Noriko, lives with her senile father-in-law, Shukichi, on a farm. He believes his favorite cow, long gone, is still alive. Noriko pretends to be the cow and lets him milk her - a satisfying arrangement for them both. A Lonely Cow Weeps at Dawn
